# Woodlands, the (Staff)
## Overview
**Aura** strong varied; **CL** 13th

**Slot** none

**Price** 100,400 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

Appearing to have grown naturally into its shape, this oak, ash, or yew staff allows use of the following spells:

- *[[Charm Animal (Spell)|Charm animal]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Speak with Animals (Spell)|Speak with animals]]* (1 charge)
- *[[Barkskin (Spell)|Barkskin]]* (2 charges)
- *[[Summon Nature's Ally VI (Spell)|Summon nature’s ally VI]]* (3 charges)
- *[[Wall of Thorns (Spell)|Wall of thorns]]* (3 charges)
- *[[Animate Plants (Spell)|Animate plants]]* (4 charges)

The staff may be used as a weapon, functioning as a *+2 quarterstaff*. The *staff of the woodlands* also allows its wielder to cast *[[Pass Without Trace (Spell)|pass without trace]]* at will, with no charge cost. These two attributes continue to function after all the charges are expended.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Magic Arms and Armor (Feat)|Craft Magic Arms and Armor]], [[Craft Staff (Feat)|Craft Staff]], *[[Animate Plants (Spell)|animate plants]], [[Barkskin (Spell)|barkskin]], [[Charm Animal (Spell)|charm animal]], [[Pass Without Trace (Spell)|pass without trace]], [[Speak with Animals (Spell)|speak with animals]], [[Summon Nature's Ally VI (Spell)|summon nature’s ally VI]], [[Wall of Thorns (Spell)|wall of thorns]]*

**Cost** 50,500 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 496
